steps.run: cd mega-linter-runner && npm install
cd mega-linter-runner && npm publish || echo "mega-linter-runner not published"

steps.name: Deploy Release image to Dockerhub
steps.run: .automation/upload-docker.sh

steps.name: Deploy Release image to GitHub Container Registry
steps.run: .automation/upload-docker.sh

steps.name: Free Disk space
steps.run:
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/lib/android  # will release about 10 GB if you don't need Android
sudo rm -rf /usr/share/dotnet # will release about 20GB if you don't need .NET

steps.name: Get release version
steps.run:
echo "::set-output name=cversion::$(git describe --tags --match='v*' --abbrev=0 | cut -c2-)"
echo "::set-output name=ctag::$(git describe --tags --match='v*' --abbrev=0)"
echo "::set-output name=pversion::$(git describe --abbrev=0 --match='v*' --tags $(git rev-list --tags --skip=1 --max-count=1) | cut -c2-)"
echo "::set-output name=ptag::$(git describe --abbrev=0 --match='v*' --tags $(git rev-list --tags --skip=1 --max-count=1))"

steps.name: Print tags
steps.run:
echo "prev tag ${{ steps.version.outputs.ptag }}"
echo "curr tag ${{ steps.version.outputs.ctag }}"
echo "prev ver ${{ steps.version.outputs.pversion }}"
echo "curr ver ${{ steps.version.outputs.cversion }}"
pip install mike mkdocs-material mdx_truly_sane_lists json-schema-for-humans
cd .automation && bash build_schemas_doc.sh && cd ..

git config --global user.name megalinter-bot
git config --global user.email megalinter@megalinter.com

steps.name: Checkout previous tag
steps.run: git checkout ${{ steps.version.outputs.ptag }}

steps.name: Mike deploy previous version
steps.run:
mike delete ${{ steps.version.outputs.pversion }} || echo 'version does not exists yet'
mike deploy ${{ steps.version.outputs.pversion }}

steps.name: Checkout current tag
steps.run: git checkout ${{ steps.version.outputs.ctag }}

steps.name: Mike deploy current version
steps.run:
mike delete latest
mike deploy --push latest ${{ steps.version.outputs.cversion }}

steps.name: Deploy Release image to Dockerhub
steps.run: .automation/upload-docker.sh

steps.name: Deploy Release image to GitHub Container Registry
steps.run: .automation/upload-docker.sh

steps.name: Free Disk space
steps.run:
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/lib/android  # will release about 10 GB if you don't need Android
sudo rm -rf /usr/share/dotnet # will release about 20GB if you don't need .NET

steps.name: Get release version
steps.run:
echo "::set-output name=cversion::$(git describe --tags --match='v*' --abbrev=0 | cut -c2-)"
echo "::set-output name=ctag::$(git describe --tags --match='v*' --abbrev=0)"
echo "::set-output name=pversion::$(git describe --abbrev=0 --match='v*' --tags $(git rev-list --tags --skip=1 --max-count=1) | cut -c2-)"
echo "::set-output name=ptag::$(git describe --abbrev=0 --match='v*' --tags $(git rev-list --tags --skip=1 --max-count=1))"

steps.name: Print tags
steps.run:
echo "prev tag ${{ steps.version.outputs.ptag }}"
echo "curr tag ${{ steps.version.outputs.ctag }}"
echo "prev ver ${{ steps.version.outputs.pversion }}"
echo "curr ver ${{ steps.version.outputs.cversion }}"
pip install --upgrade markdown==3.3.7 mike mkdocs-material mdx_truly_sane_lists json-schema-for-humans giturlparse webpreview
cd .automation && bash build_schemas_doc.sh && cd ..

git config --global user.name megalinter-bot
git config --global user.email megalinter@megalinter.com
git stash

steps.name: Checkout previous tag
steps.run: git checkout ${{ steps.version.outputs.ptag }}

steps.name: Mike deploy previous version
steps.run:
mike delete ${{ steps.version.outputs.pversion }} || echo 'version does not exists yet'
mike deploy ${{ steps.version.outputs.pversion }}

steps.name: Checkout current tag
steps.run: git checkout ${{ steps.version.outputs.ctag }}

steps.name: Mike deploy current version
steps.run:
mike delete latest
mike delete v6 || true
mike deploy v6 || true
mike deploy --push latest ${{ steps.version.outputs.cversion }}
